name: Forthe
content:
Forthe was a human male member of the House of Tagge and an employee of Tagge Corporation during the Galactic Civil War. Forthe's mother was TaggeCo's Head of Talent Acquisition Layla Tagge-Faulken.
In 3 or 4 ABY, Forthe was present on the Acquisitor during a session in which Tagge Co's leader Lady Domina Tagge tested the Tagge protoblade. Domina remarked that, despite the weapon's efficacy, the Galactic Empire would not pay for it. Forthe asked her if that was because the weapon would be cont-ineffective to deploy at mass scale, which she confirmed. Domina addressed Forthe by name, telling the young man that young Tagges like him were the future of the company. Forthe beamed with excitement at the compliment, and even the fact that Lady Domina knew his name.
After leaving the testing area where Forthe was present, Domina confirmed with her secretary Lapin that Forthe was the son of Layla. When Lapin confirmed that, Domina implicitly threatened Forthe by remarking that Layla would be on her "best behavior" or something "unfortunate" could happen to her son.
Forthe appeared in the 2021 comic War of the Bounty Hunters â€“ Boushh 1.
